org.wildfly.swarm

Class Swarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.Swarm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Container

    public class Swarm
extends Object
    Default main(...) if an application does not provide one.

    This simply constructs a default container, starts it and performs a default deployment. Typically only useful for barren WAR applications.

    Author:
    Bob McWhirter, Ken Finnigan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Swarm

        public Swarm()
      throws Exception
        Construct a new, un-started container.
        Throws:
        Exception - If an error occurs performing classloading and initialization magic.

      • Swarm

        public Swarm(boolean debugBootstrap)
      throws Exception
        Construct a new, un-started container.
        Parameters:
        debugBootstrap - - flag to indicate if the module layer should be put into bootstrap debug mode. Same as the jboss-module -debuglog mode which enables trace logging to System.out during the initial bootstrap of the module layer.
        Throws:
        Exception - If an error occurs performing classloading and initialization magic.

      • Swarm

        public Swarm(String... args)
      throws Exception
        Construct a new, un-started container, configured using command-line arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - The command-line arguments arguments
        Throws:
        Exception - If an error occurs performing classloading and initialization magic.

      • Swarm

        public Swarm(boolean debugBootstrap,
             String... args)
      throws Exception
        Construct a new, un-started container, configured using command-line arguments.
        Parameters:
        debugBootstrap - - flag to indicate if the module layer should be put into bootstrap debug mode. Same as the jboss-module -debuglog mode which enables trace logging to System.out during the initial bootstrap of the module layer.
        args - The command-line arguments arguments
        Throws:
        Exception - If an error occurs performing classloading and initialization magic.

      • start

        public Swarm start(<any> deployment)
            throws Exception
        Start the container with a deployment.

        Effectively calls start().deploy(deployment)

        Parameters:
        deployment - The deployment to deploy.
        Returns:
        The container.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs.
        See Also:
        start(), #deploy(Archive)

      • stop

        public Swarm stop()
           throws Exception
        Stop the container, undeploying all deployments.
        Returns:
        THe container.
        Throws:
        Exception - If an error occurs.

      • deploy

        public Swarm deploy()
             throws Exception
        Deploy the default WAR deployment.

        For WAR-based applications, the primary WAR artifact iwll be deployed.

        Returns:
        The container.
        Throws:
        DeploymentException - if an error occurs.
        Exception

        Parameters:
